## Load the weather data

```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728", "USW00022534", "USS0023B17S"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2021-01-01",
    date_max = "2022-12-31") |>
  mutate(
    name = recode(
      id, 
      USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY", 
      USW00022534 = "Molokai_HI",
      USS0023B17S = "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10,
    month = lubridate::floor_date(date, unit = "month")) |>
  select(name, id, everything())

weather_df
```

## `group_by`

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month)
```

## counting things

count month observations

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month) %>% 
  summarize(n_obs = n())
```

we can use `count()`

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  count(name, month, name= "n_obs")
```

Never use Base R's `table`

```{r, eval = FALSE}
weather_df %>% 
  pull(month) %>% 
  table()
```

Other helpful counters

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarize(
    n_obs = n(),
    n_days = n_distinct(date))
```


## A digression on 2x2 tables

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  filter(name != "Molokai_HI") %>% 
  mutate(
    cold = case_when(
      tmax <  5 ~ "cold",
      tmax >= 5 ~ "not_cold",
      TRUE      ~ ""
    )
  ) %>% 
  group_by(name, cold) %>% 
  summarize(count = n())
```

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  filter(name != "Molokai_HI") %>% 
  mutate(
    cold = case_when(
      tmax <  5 ~ "cold",
      tmax >= 5 ~ "not_cold",
      TRUE      ~ ""
    )
  ) %>% 
  janitor::tabyl(name, cold)
```
